name: big-pecks
effect: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.

flavor_text.black-white: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
